doc.field: Series V: Video includes original footage of Collective: Unconscious productions, commercial videos, as well as source material collected as background research for productions and as documentation of other avant-garde artists. Subseries B, Originals includes recordings on various media of Collective: Unconscious performances. The bulk of material documents the anti-slams, episodes of Manifestations, and Faceboy. Series C, Miscellaneous, contains recordings collected by Collective: Unconscious, including commercial films, independent productions by contemporary and avant-garde artists, mixed recordings of source materials (primarily archival footage and television productions), and unidentified tapes.
Subseries A: Access Copies Subseries B: Originals Subseries C: Miscellaneous
